Segment.name: G61
Segment.comment: To identify a person or office to whom communications should be directed

Field.name: ContactFunctionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the major duty or responsibility of the person or group named

Field.name: CommunicationNumberQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of communication number

Field.name: CommunicationNumber
Field.comment: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

Field.name: ContactInquiryReference
Field.comment: Additional reference number or description to clarify a contact number

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G6103 or G6104 is present, then the other is required.
